entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn JSON detection marks strings as JSON even if StringSyntaxAttribute says it's not. #74020

Closed

  • IDE0072: False positive when using switch expression over a Nullable<T>, where both null and T cases are present #50983
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not treat text as json when passed to api that explicit says it is not #74019
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not offer to add default switch case when it handles `null` and an underlying value #74018
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix find refs doing too much work lookign for types that had an alias to them in one file. #74015
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
